description: This dataset provides a comprehensive analysis of the cost of living for selected cities worldwide. It includes factors such as the cost of a cappuccino, cinema ticket, bottle of wine, liter of gasoline, average rent, and average disposable income.

data_columns.name: Cappuccino
data_columns.description: Cost of a cappuccino in the city.

data_columns.name: Cinema
data_columns.description: Cost of a cinema ticket in the city.

data_columns.name: Wine
data_columns.description: Cost of a bottle of wine in the city.

data_columns.name: Gasoline
data_columns.description: Cost of one liter of gasoline in the city.

data_columns.name: Avg Rent
data_columns.description: Average monthly rent for accommodation in the city.

data_columns.name: Avg Disposable Income
data_columns.description: Average disposable income per month in the city.

source: CSV file containing cost of living data for selected cities.
size: Variable (depends on the number of cities included)
accessibility: The data will be made freely available to the public.
reuse_conditions: The data can be reused and redistributed with proper attribution.
provenance: The data has been collected and curated for the purpose of cost of living analysis.
data_quality_assurance: Quality assurance processes have been implemented to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the data.
